data.lyric:
[ti:Blue Tint (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.12]Blue Tint (Explicit) - Drake
[00:00.72]Producer：Supah Mario/Illmind
[00:00.85]Future：
[00:01.44]Mario
[00:04.30]Pluto
[00:09.35]Gang gang gang gang gang
[00:10.98]Drake：
[00:15.12]Look who I'm f**kin' again
[00:16.67]I had her on ice but then
[00:18.64]I watched the ice get thin
[00:20.42]Now does she sink or swim
[00:22.13]She had an attitude in the summer
[00:23.74]But she bein' nice again
[00:25.79]Double my price again
[00:27.56]Top of the charts back in they hearts
[00:29.27]N**ga he strikes again woah
[00:31.10]Some n**gas bitter with life and they hate me
[00:32.80]They wanna put knife in my ribs woah
[00:34.63]Way this sh*t set up I live like Ronaldo
[00:36.31]But I never been in Madrid woah
[00:38.20]She said that that she workin' I told her come over
[00:39.94]And we can get right at the crib woah
[00:41.77]She finish at six but then say she got court in the morning
[00:44.04]To fight for her kid I told her I'd pray for the kid
[00:47.31]What a time this is
[00:48.90]To be alive for this sh*t
[00:50.88]President doin' us in
[00:52.31]My window got blue in the tint ooh
[00:55.82]Did this sh*t once and I'd do it again
[00:58.12]Look who I'm f**kin' again
[00:59.67]I had her on ice but then
[01:01.39]I watched the ice get thin
[01:03.24]Now does she sink or swim
[01:04.86]Future/Drake：
[01:05.22]Blue faces I got blue diamonds blue tint yeah
[01:08.85]Blue faces I got blue diamonds blue tint yeah
[01:13.32]Jeez
[01:17.77]Ayy ayy
[01:19.17]Drake：
[01:19.37]Look who I'm stuck with again
[01:21.12]I had her on ice but then
[01:23.07]I watched the ice get so thin
[01:24.82]Now does she sink or does she swim now
[01:26.89]Drake：
[01:27.58]Ayy 'cause she bein' nice again
[01:30.26]Double my price again
[01:32.00]Top of the charts back in they hearts
[01:33.68]N**ga he strikes again woah
[01:35.58]Some n**gas bitter with life and they hate me
[01:37.17]They wanna put knife in my ribs woah
[01:39.07]Drake：
[01:39.19]Nobody better the show up and runnin'
[01:40.88]And I could put that on the twins woah
[01:42.70]We not together but I get the info on you
[01:44.69]'Cause I'm nice to your friends
[01:45.83]Woah woah woah woah
[01:49.08]Yeah they shouldn't have told me but they did
[01:51.76]What a time this is
[01:53.30]To be alive for this sh*t
[01:55.24]President doin' us in
[01:57.02]My window got blue in the tint ayy
[02:00.23]Did this sh*t once and I'd do it again
[02:02.52]Look who I'm f**kin' again
[02:04.13]I had her on ice but then
[02:05.95]I watched the ice get thin
[02:07.74]Now does she sink or swim
[02:09.15]Future：
[02:09.42]Blue faces I got blue diamonds blue tint yeah
[02:13.31]Blue faces I got blue diamonds blue tint yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Blue Tint (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.12]//
[00:00.72]//
[00:00.85]//
[00:01.44]马里奥
[00:04.30]普鲁托
[00:09.35]匪帮 匪帮 匪帮 匪帮 匪帮
[00:10.98]//
[00:15.12]看呐 我又在和谁翻云覆雨
[00:16.67]我把她放在冰块上 后来
[00:18.64]我看到冰块渐渐融化
[00:20.42]现在她沉下去了 或者在里面游泳了
[00:22.13]夏天的时候她我行我素
[00:23.74]但她后来又变得温柔了
[00:25.79]我的身价又涨了一倍
[00:27.56]榜单之首 重回他们的心中
[00:29.27]哥们 他又一次成了热门
[00:31.10]有些人生活苦逼 他们恨我
[00:32.80]他们想拿刀捅我
[00:34.63]看看这些玩意儿 我活得就像罗纳尔多
[00:36.31]但我从来没去过马德里
[00:38.20]她说她在上班呢 我还是叫她过来
[00:39.94]好让我们在床上好好玩一玩
[00:41.77]她六点下班 但她说明天早上还要上庭
[00:44.04]争取孩子的抚养权 我说我会为这孩子祈祷的
[00:47.31]这是什么时代
[00:48.90]活着就为了处理这些破事儿
[00:50.88]总统欺骗我们
[00:52.31]我的窗户都变成了蓝色
[00:55.82]我曾经这样干过 我还会再这样干
[00:58.12]看呐 我又在和谁翻云覆雨
[00:59.67]我把她放在冰块上 后来
[01:01.39]我看到冰块渐渐融化
[01:03.24]现在她沉下去了 或者在里面游泳了
[01:04.86]//
[01:05.22]忧愁的面孔 我有蓝色的钻石 浅浅的蓝色
[01:08.85]忧愁的面孔 我有蓝色的钻石 浅浅的蓝色
[01:13.32]天哪
[01:17.77]//
[01:19.17]//
[01:19.37]看呐 我又和谁在一起呀
[01:21.12]我把她放在冰块上 后来
[01:23.07]我看到冰块渐渐融化
[01:24.82]现在她沉下去了还是在游泳呢
[01:26.89]//
[01:27.58]因为她又变得很温柔了
[01:30.26]我的身价又涨了一倍
[01:32.00]榜单之首 重回他们的心中
[01:33.68]哥们 他又一次成了热门
[01:35.58]有些人生活苦逼 他们恨我
[01:37.17]他们想拿刀捅我
[01:39.07]//
[01:39.19]谁都好不到哪儿去 表演开始了
[01:40.88]我可以让那对双胞胎承受这一切
[01:42.70]我们没在一起过 但我了解你
[01:44.69]因为我对你的朋友很好
[01:45.83]//
[01:49.08]他们不该告诉我的 但他们还是说了
[01:51.76]这是什么时代
[01:53.30]活着就为了处理这些破事儿
[01:55.24]总统欺骗我们
[01:57.02]我的窗户都变成了蓝色
[02:00.23]我曾经这样干过 我还会再这样干
[02:02.52]看呐 我又在和谁翻云覆雨
[02:04.13]我把她放在冰块上 后来
[02:05.95]我看到冰块渐渐融化
[02:07.74]现在她沉下去了 或者在里面游泳了
[02:09.15]//
[02:09.42]忧愁的面孔 我有蓝色的钻石 浅浅的蓝色
[02:13.31]忧愁的面孔 我有蓝色的钻石 浅浅的蓝色
